etymology.description: 洛 (Luo River) + 阳 (sunny side/north of a river) = city on the north bank of the Luo River.
etymology.interpretation: Named for its position on the sunny (north) side of the Luo River; now a historic former capital and modern city in Henan.
etymology.simplification: 阳 simplified from 陽 by reducing the right-side component (昜) to a simpler form while keeping the left 阝 ‘hill/place’ radical; 洛 unchanged.

parts.english: Luo River; river name; used in place names; transliteration component
sun; sunny side/north of a river; positive (yang); male

examples.chinese: 我打算去洛阳旅行(我打算去洛陽旅行)。
examples.english: I’m planning to travel to Luoyang.

examples.chinese: 洛阳位于河南省西部(洛陽位於河南省西部)。
examples.english: Luoyang is located in western Henan Province.

examples.chinese: 多个王朝曾在洛阳建都(多個王朝曾在洛陽建都)。
examples.pinyin: Duō gè wángcháo céng zài Luòyáng jiàndū.
examples.english: Multiple dynasties once established their capitals in Luoyang.
